words.def: a large artillery gun that is usually on wheels
a rule or especially body of rules or principles generally established as valid and fundamental in a field or art or philosophy
The corner of a wall or rafter.
conduct or direct the steering of a ship or plane
airtight sealed metal container for food or drink or paint etc.
an argument opposed to a proposal
South American wood sorrel cultivated for its edible tubers
a silvery soft waxy metallic element of the alkali metal group
